comment.author: 58808789@N03
comment._content: Do you know when or where this was taken? Or even who is in the picture? My family are from the island so it may be a distant relative! Would love to know.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/58808789@N03] I'm afraid I don't have a lot more information. It was taken between around 1906 and 1914 on Arranmore, but that's about all we have.

Could you pass a link on to your family to see if it jogs any memories?

P.S. I've replaced with a higher res version - hope that helps!
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 58808789@N03
comment._content: I'm trying to figure out what part of the island it is but there's not much to go on. I've passed it on already so maybe they'll know. Thanks for replying, really appreciate it!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/58808789@N03] Not at all, and thanks for passing this one around!
